title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 481.10 - Unloaded weight method, rate of tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 481.10 - Unloaded weight method, rate of tax

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 503(3)

The following table sets forth the rates of tax
applicable to each truck or tractor: Unloaded Weight of

Truck

Weight Group Tax

Rate
1. 8,001 to 9,000 inclusive
$0.004
2. 9,001 to 10,000 inclusive.005
3. 10,001 to 11,000 inclusive.007
4. 11,001 to 12,000 inclusive.008
5. 12,001 to 13,000 inclusive.009
6. 13,001 to 14,000 inclusive.010
7. 14,001 to 15,000 inclusive.011
8. 15,001 to 17,500 inclusive.012
9. 17,501 to 20,000 inclusive.014
10. 20,001 to 22,500 inclusive.018
11. 22,501 to 25,000 inclusive.022
12. 25,001 and over.027

Unloaded Weight of

Tractor

Weight Group Tax

Rate
1. 4,001 to 5,500 inclusive
$0.006
2. 5,501 to 7,000 inclusive.010
3. 7,001 to 8,500 inclusive.014
4. 8,501 to 10,000 inclusive.018
5. 10,001 to 12,000 inclusive.025
6. 12,001 and over.033

Notes

481.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
